summary: Working as an SRE supporting the CX Cloud product from Cisco
Promoted to Senior Network Engineer, working on cloud-based web applications in support of features of the CloudGen Firewall
The most senior support engineer for Barracuda Networks SSL VPN appliances, and an authority on the CloudGen Firewall product line
Worked as part of the helpdesk team for a university engineering department, and was one of the system administrators for the university's Electrical Engineering department
